################################################################################
################################################################################
#                                                                              #
# Payment Members - maps to payments.member_transaction                        #
#                                                                              #
# Columns                                                                      #
# -------                                                                      #
#                                                                              #
# 1 = id                                                                       #
# 2 = user_id                                                                  #
# 3 = amount                                                                   #
# 4 = org_id                                                                   #
# 5 = other_member_id                                                          #
# 6 = stripe_transaction_id                                                    #
# 7 = description                                                              #
# 8 = transaction_type (see https://cobalt-bridge.readthedocs.io/en/latest/_modules/payments/models.html)
# 12 = days_ago (optional)                                                     #
# 13 = hour (optional)                                                         #
# 14 - minute (optional)                                                       #
#                                                                              #
# Notes: To be valid you must have one and only one of other_member_id,        #
#        stripe_transaction_id or org_id. There is no validation on this.      #
#        If you want the transaction to be backdated (created_date in the      #
#         past), you can specify days_ago.                                     #
#        To make the transactions more realistic you can also specify  the     #
#        hour and minute in 24 hour format.                                    #
#                                                                              #
################################################################################
################################################################################
tr1, bb, 45.00,,,stripe1, Payment from card **** **** ***** 4242 Exp 4/24, CC Payment, 1, 16, 55
tr2, bb, -45.00, fbc,,, Entry into Popup Tournament, Congress Entry,,,
